statements: SELECT * FROM TeamDocuments WHERE owner_id = '12345';
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM TeamDocuments WHERE updated_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name FROM TeamDocuments WHERE owner_id = '54321' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT document_name, owner_id FROM TeamDocuments WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM TeamDocuments WHERE updated_at IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM TeamDocuments WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_name, created_at FROM TeamDocuments WHERE document_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM TeamDocuments ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM TeamDocuments WHERE updated_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND updated_at < '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT document_name, owner_id FROM TeamDocuments WHERE owner_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '987e6543-e21b-45c6-ba98-654321468975') ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_name, owner_team FROM documents WHERE version > 1;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, owner_team FROM documents WHERE owner_team = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_id <= 100;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE owner_team = 'Engineering' ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, version FROM documents WHERE owner_team = 'Marketing';
SELECT document_id, document_name, owner_team, version FROM documents WHERE version >= 2;
SELECT document_name, owner_team, version FROM documents WHERE version IS NULL;
SELECT d.document_name, r.resource_name FROM documents d JOIN resources r ON d.document_id = r.document_id WHERE r.resource_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE id = 1;
SELECT doc_name, owner_id FROM documents ORDER BY doc_id DESC;
SELECT resource_name FROM resources WHERE doc_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM documents JOIN team_members ON documents.owner_id = team_members.id;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE id = 1;
SELECT doc_name, resource_name FROM documents JOIN resources ON documents.doc_id = resources.doc_id;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE owner_id IN (SELECT id FROM team_members WHERE name = 'Alice');

SELECT team_members.name, resources.resource_name FROM team_members JOIN documents ON team_members.id = documents.owner_id JOIN resources ON documents.doc_id = resources.doc_id ORDER BY team_members.name DESC, resources.resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, created_at FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT version_number, version_content FROM versions WHERE document_id = 5 ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM teams WHERE team_id > 2 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, created_at FROM documents WHERE team_id = 3 AND document_id < 10;
SELECT resource_name, resource_url, uploaded_by FROM resources WHERE team_id = 4 ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC;
SELECT version_id, document_id, version_number, created_at FROM versions WHERE version_number >= 5 AND version_number <= 10;
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE name LIKE 'Engineering%';
SELECT description, name FROM teams ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, type, url FROM resources WHERE type = 'PDF';
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.name AS team_name, d.title AS document_title FROM teams t JOIN team_documents td ON t.id = td.team_id JOIN documents d ON td.document_id = d.id;
SELECT r.name AS resource_name, r.type AS resource_type, t.name AS team_name FROM resources r JOIN team_resources tr ON r.id = tr.resource_id JOIN teams t ON tr.team_id = t.id;
SELECT t.name AS team_name, COUNT(d.id) AS document_count FROM teams t LEFT JOIN team_documents td ON t.id = td.team_id LEFT JOIN documents d ON td.document_id = d.id GROUP BY t.name;
